name: Lockdown (Pryzmat, CrunChester, Thiesue, MilekHippy)
description:
Our lives are not like before. Everyone must get used to new way of living.
You're stuck within four walls but it doesn't mean you can't creatively spend your free time! 

But the question remains. What should you do today?

Game contains:
- 32 selectable actions,
- 3  different endings,
- relatable protagonist
